document_data.name: Enixtryx
document_data.mainbody: '''Enitryx''' was a [[black dragon]] and a member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
document_data.Relationships: He was the familiar of the [[half-dragon]] [[Vargo Kent]] after [[Amnemis]] became too big and became Vargo's cohort instead.
document_data.Activities: The [[dragon]] resided in the [[Well of Dragons]] with his master.
